title: Crystal Dreams
description: Amelia is tired of being dead, cursed into a cycle of reincarnation and death at the hands of her lover. She craves the touch of him, her murderer. She searches Daray out but finds Charm instead. Charm is surprised by the ghost that she takes home. Amelia is more than a nuisance, she is an unexpected pleasure, a delightful sub. Daray is shocked to find his love in the arms of another woman. Even more surprising is the way Charm welcomes him into her arms and bed.
